exceptions.exn: In environment n : nid m : [ordType of nid] d : dstatelet s : soup H : valid (dstate d) H0 : m \\in dom (dstate d) Unable to unify "match find n (upd m match find m (dstate d) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end (dstate d)) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end" with "match find n (dstate d) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nid
m: Equality.sort [ordType of nid]
d: dstatelet
s: soup

Goal:
valid (dstate d) -> m \in dom (dstate d) -> getLocal n d = getLocal n {| dstate := upd m (getLocal m d) (dstate d); dsoup := s |}

Premises:
getLocal = fun (n : nid) (d : dstatelet) => match find n (dstate d) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end : nid -> dstatelet -> heap
dom : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), cT -> seq K
nid = nat : Set
dstate = fun d : dstatelet => let (dstate, _) := d in dstate : dstatelet -> lstate_type heap
Notation valid := valid
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
soup = union_map mid (msg TaggedMessage) : Type
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
dsoup = fun d : dstatelet => let (_, dsoup) := d in dsoup : dstatelet -> soup
upd : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), K -> V -> cT -> cT
Notation ordType := ordType
leq_addr : forall m n : nat, n <= n + m
leq = fun m n : nat => m - n == 0 : nat -> nat -> bool Arguments leq (_ _)%nat_scope
axioms.dyn : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A : ?C), interp A -> {x : ?C & interp x} where ?C : [n : nid m : [ordType of nid] d : dstatelet s : soup |- Type]
empty_dstatelet = {| dstate := empty_lstate [::]; dsoup := Unit |} : dstatelet
valid_mt_state = (fun _evar_0_ : true => eq_ind_r [eta is_true] _evar_0_ (valid_unit (union_mapPCM [ordType of nid] heap))) is_true_true : valid (dstate empty_dstatelet)
post_valid : forall s : soup, valid s -> forall m : msg TaggedMessage, valid (post_msg s m).1
is_active = fun (s : soup) (id : mid) => exists m : msg TaggedMessage, find id s = Some m /\ active m : soup -> mid -> Prop
is_consumed = fun (s : soup) (id : mid) => exists m : msg TaggedMessage, find id s = Some m /\ ~~ active m : soup -> mid -> Prop
leqNgt : forall m n : nat, (m <= n) = ~~ (n < m)
mt_nodes = (fun _evar_0_ : [::] =i [::] => eq_ind_r (fun _pattern_value_ : seq [ordType of nid] => _pattern_value_ =i [::]) _evar_0_ (dom0 (union_mapUMC [ordType of nid] heap))) (fun x : [ordType of nid] => erefl (x \in [::])) : dom (dstate empty_dstatelet) =i [::]
leq_eqVlt : forall m n : nat, (m <= n) = (m == n) || (m < n)
DepMaps.DepMaps.pf : forall (V : Type) (labF : V -> DepMaps.DepMaps.Label) (d : DepMaps.DepMaps.depmap labF), DepMaps.DepMaps.dmDom labF (DepMaps.DepMaps.dmap d)
consume_msg = fun (s : soup) (id : mid) => match find id s with | Some m => upd id (mark_msg m) s | None => s end : soup -> mid -> soup
empty_lstate = fix empty_lstate (ns : seq nid) : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap) := match ns with | [::] => Unit | n :: ns' => n \\ -> Heap.empty \+ empty_lstate ns' end : seq nid -> union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap) Arguments empty_lstate _%seq_scope
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
find_mark : forall (m : mid) (s' : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (msg0 : msg TaggedMessage), valid s' -> find m (consume_msg s' m) = Some msg0 -> exists msg' : msg TaggedMessage, find m s' = Some msg' /\ msg0 = mark_msg msg'
Equality.sort = fun t : eqType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : eqType -> Type Equality.sort is a coercion
dom_freshn : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (n : nat), fresh f + n \notin dom f
dom_last_key : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V), valid f -> ~~ empb f -> last_key f \in dom f
max_key_last : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (x : [ordType of nat]), x \in dom f -> {in dom f, forall y : nat, y <= x} -> last_key f = x
dom_ordfresh : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (x : [ordType of nat]), x \in dom f -> x < fresh f
last_key_max : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (x : [ordType of nat]), x \in dom f -> x <= last_key f
last_key_dom : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V), valid f -> last_key f \notin dom f -> f = Unit
sorted_max_key_last : forall (A : ordType) (s : seq A) (x y : A), sorted oleq s -> x \in s -> (forall z : A, z \in s -> oleq z x) -> last y s = x
mem = fun (T : Type) (pT : predType T) => let '{| pred_sort := pred_sort0; topred := toP |} as pT0 := pT return (pT0 -> mem_pred T) in fun A : {| pred_sort := pred_sort0; topred := toP |} => ssrbool.Mem [eta toP A] : forall (T : Type) (pT : predType T), pT -> mem_pred T Arguments mem {T}%type_scope {pT} A : rename, simpl never
heapUMC = UMC.Pack {| UMC.p := fun k : ptr_ordType => k != null; UMC.mixin := heapUMCMix |} : union_map_class ptr_ordType (axioms.dynamic id)
Variant validUn_spec (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (f1 f2 : U) : bool -> Type := valid_false1 : ~~ valid f1 -> validUn_spec f1 f2 false | valid_false2 : ~~ valid f2 -> validUn_spec f1 f2 false | valid_false3 : forall k : K, k \in dom f1 -> k \in dom f2 -> validUn_spec f1 f2 false | valid_true : valid f1 -> valid f2 ->...-> validUn_spec f1 f2 true Arguments validUn_spec [K] [V]%type_scope [U] _ _ _%bool_scope Arguments valid_false1 [K] [V]%type_scope [U f1] Arguments valid_false2 [K] [V]%type_scope [U] _ [f2] Arguments valid_false3 [K] [V]%type_scope [U f1 f2 k] Arguments valid_true [K] [V]%type_scope [U f1 f2] _ _ _%function_scope
validUnU : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (v : V) (f1 f2 : U), k \in dom f2 -> valid (f1 \+ upd k v f2) = valid (f1 \+ f2)
valid_true : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (f1 f2 : U), valid f1 -> valid f2 -> (forall x : K, x \in dom f1 -> x \notin dom f2) -> validUn_spec f1 f2 true
dom_inIR : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f1 f2 : U), valid (f1 \+ f2) -> k \in dom f2 -> k \in dom (f1 \+ f2)
dom_inIL : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f1 f2 : U), valid (f1 \+ f2) -> k \in dom f1 -> k \in dom (f1 \+ f2)
sorted_last_key_max : forall (A : ordType) (s : seq A) (x y : A), sorted oleq s -> x \in s -> oleq x (last y s)
last_key_mono : forall (V : Type) (f1 f2 : union_map [ordType of nat] V), {subset dom f1 <= dom f2} -> last_key f1 <= last_key f2
valid_fresh' : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (v : V) (i : [ordType of nat]) (w : V), valid (f \+ i \\-> w) -> valid (f \+ fresh (f \+ i \\-> w) \\-> v)
dom_inNR : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f1 f2 : U), valid (f1 \+ f2) -> k \in dom f2 -> k \notin dom f1
dom_inNL : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f1 f2 : U), valid (f1 \+ f2) -> k \in dom f1 -> k \notin dom f2
last_keyfUn : forall (V : Type) (f1 f2 : union_map [ordType of nat] V), valid (f1 \+ f2) -> last_key f1 <= last_key (f1 \+ f2)
last_keyUnf : forall (V : Type) (f1 f2 : union_map [ordType of nat] V), valid (f1 \+ f2) -> last_key f2 <= last_key (f1 \+ f2)
fresh : forall V : Type, union_map [ordType of nat] V -> nat
last_key : forall V : Type, union_map [ordType of nat] V -> nat

``` 
intros.
intros Hv Hm.
unfold getLocal.
simpl.
rewrite Hm.
reflexivity.
```

original: intros. intros Hv Hm. unfold getLocal. simpl. rewrite Hm. reflexivity.
